comment: With my first shot, my arm was slightly sore and I was tired for a few hours. I wondered if the next day I would have a slight fever and have to quarantine from work for days. Would have been ironic to have to quarantine from work for having a Covid shot.
amr:
# ::snt With my first shot, my arm was slightly sore and I was tired for a few hours. I wondered if the next day I would have a slight fever and have to quarantine from work for days. Would have been ironic to have to quarantine from work for having a Covid shot.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (s / sore
                  :domain (a2 / arm
                        :part-of (ii / i))
                  :mod (s2 / slight))
            :op2 (t / tire-01
                  :ARG1 ii
                  :duration (f / few
                        :op1 (t2 / temporal-quantity
                              :quant 1
                              :unit (h / hour))))
            :time (s3 / shoot-02
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ord (o / ordinal-entity
                        :value 1)))
      :snt2 (w / wonder-01
            :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
            :ARG1 (t3 / truth-value
                  :polarity-of (a3 / and
                        :op1 (h2 / have-03
                              :ARG0 ii2
                              :ARG1 (f2 / fever
                                    :degree (s4 / slight)))
                        :op2 (o2 / obligate-01
                              :ARG1 ii2
                              :ARG2 (q / quarantine-01
                                    :ARG0 ii2
                                    :ARG2 (w2 / work-01)
                                    :duration (m2 / multiple
                                          :op1 (t4 / temporal-quantity
                                                :quant 1
                                                :unit (d / day))))
                              :time (d2 / day
                                    :mod (n / next))))))
      :snt3 (ii3 / ironic
            :domain (o3 / obligate-01
                  :ARG2 (q2 / quarantine-01
                        :ARG2 (w3 / work-01)
                        :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
                              :ARG0 (h3 / have-03
                                    :ARG0 ii2
                                    :ARG1 (s5 / shoot-02
                                          :mod (c2 / city
                                                :name (n2 / name
                                                      :op1 "Covid")))))))))

comment: Last time got sick n missed work
amr:
# ::snt Last time got sick n missed work
(a / and
      :op1 (g / get-03
            :ARG2 (s / sick-05)
            :time (l / last))
      :op2 (m / miss-02
            :ARG1 (w / work-01)))

comment: On the second shot, just a slight sore arm like all shots, no symptoms at all.
amr:
# ::snt On the second shot, just a slight sore arm like all shots, no symptoms at all.
(s / symptom
      :polarity -
      :mod (a / at-all)
      :domain (a2 / arm
            :ARG1-of (s2 / sore-02
                  :degree (s3 / slight))
            :ARG1-of (r / resemble-01
                  :ARG2 (s4 / shot
                        :mod (a3 / all)))
            :mod (j / just))
      :time s4
      :ord (o / ordinal-entity
            :value 2))
